User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://virtualaddress.biz/sitemap.xml

# Block access to admin/private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /api/

# Allow all search engines to crawl the main content
Allow: /
Allow: /faq
Allow: /incorporation-guide
Allow: /acra-compliance
